author: Lorie Konish
title: Here's what Congress may do to fix Social Security this fall
description: The House of Representatives may vote on a measure to extend Social Security's solvency in the next few months. That, coupled with new proposals to change a rule that affects public workers' benefits, could amount to the most substantial reforms to the insura…
content:
Rep. Bill Pascrell, Jr., D-N.J., speaks during a House Democrats' news conference on Wednesday, July 30, 2014.
